module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
Base module containing common logic for jInfer.
Every jInfer module should depend on Base.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.netbeans.modules.projectapi/1 > 1.31.1, org.openide.dialogs > 7.15.1, org.openide.io > 1.23.1, org.openide.modules > 7.17.1, org.openide.util > 8.6.1, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.3.1
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Short-Description: Base module containing common logic for jInfer

module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Simple implementation of SchemaGenerator. Exports the schema to DTD.

module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Basic implementation of IGGenerator. Works XML documents, DTD + XSD schemas and XPath queries.

module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Basic implementation of SchemaGenerator. Exports the schema to XSD.

module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Using Minimum Description Length principle to simplify Initial Grammar.

module.moduleauthor: Michal Klempa, Mário Mikula, Robert Smetana, Michal Švirec, Matej Vitásek

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
A modular initial grammar simplifier.
Works in 3 steps: first it clusters the rules, than processes each cluster (e.g. creates a prefix tree from it), and finally tries to collapse sequences to a Kleene star. The logic for each step can be switched or expanded.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: cz.cuni.mff.ksi.jinfer.base/2 > 2.0, cz.cuni.mff.ksi.jinfer.ruledisplayer/1 > 1.0, org.openide.awt > 7.19.1.1, org.openide.util > 8.0, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.3.1, org.openide.windows > 6.30.1
